h1. Definition

|| *Application* | forum 
|| *Name* | ForumPortlet 
|| *Description* | The Forum portlet is a full features bulletin board application 
	
h2. Declaration template	
{code:language=xml|indent=2}
    <portlet-application>
      <portlet>
        <application-ref>forum</application-ref>
        <portlet-ref>ForumPortlet</portlet-ref>
      </portlet>
    </portlet-application>
{code}	
	
h1. Preferences

|| *Preference* || *Type* || *Values* || *Default* || *Description* ||
| *useAjax* | {{Boolean}} | {{true}},{{false}} | {{true}}| Defines if links in the forum will be plain hrefs or javascript ajax links (better for SEO) |

h2. Default Configuration
{code:language=xml|indent=2}
		<portlet-preferences>
			<preference>
				<name>showForumActionBar</name>
				<value>true</value> <!-- true/false -->
				<read-only>false</read-only>
			</preference>
